content.1: In the tenth year, in the tenth
content.2: Son of man, set thy face against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and prophesy against him, and against all Egypt:
content.3: Speak, and say, Thus saith the Lord
content.4: But I will put hooks in thy jaws, and I will cause the fish of thy rivers to stick unto thy scales, and I will bring thee up out of the midst of thy rivers, and all the fish of thy rivers shall stick unto thy scales.
content.6: And all the inhabitants of Egypt shall know that I
content.7: When they took hold of thee by thy hand, thou didst break, and rend all their shoulder: and when they leaned upon thee, thou brakest, and madest all their loins to be at a stand.
content.9: And the land of Egypt shall be desolate and waste; and they shall know that I
content.11: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of beast shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.
content.12: And I will make the land of Egypt desolate in the midst of the countries
content.14: And I will bring again the captivity of Egypt, and will cause them to return
content.15: It shall be the basest of the kingdoms; neither shall it exalt itself any more above the nations: for I will diminish them, that they shall no more rule over the nations.
content.16: And it shall be no more the confidence of the house of Israel, which bringeth
content.17: And it came to pass in the seven and twentieth year, in the first
content.18: Son of man, Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon caused his army to serve a great service against Tyrus: every head
content.20: I have given him the land of Egypt
